<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantfp">ConstantFP</a> &#42;CFP = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;ConstantFP&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a3fd487d9643d814ffb8ef37443e70a27acad39a154bffb61175f674d6eefaf6d0">Exp</a>-&gt;getSplatValue())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the argument is 0.75 or 0.25 it is cheaper to turn it into pow</span></CodeLine>
